For general automation and validation best practices, associate actions in the system to a product line, product type, or product feature. Depending on how widespread the automation is, this ensures that follow-on phases for new lines of business have limited rework. This also ensures optimal performance on automation that runs on Objects, such as Loan, that span many different lines of business.

This rule is specifically for nCino implementations and is not relevant outside of that. If you are not using nCino in your Org, do not activate this rule. nCino specific rules can be determined by the tag ncino-specific.

rules_name: Limit number of Page Layouts per object
rules_mdDesc:
As the number of page layouts per object increases, the performance of Salesforce org decreases.
The rule is intended to restrict the maximum number of page layouts that can be accommodated under a single object.
